findings.appetite: Dilated, fluid-filled appendix with hyperemic wall measuring up to 9 mm
findings.inflammation: Extensive inflammation and periappendiceal phlegmon formation measuring 4.4 x 3.5 cm
findings.gas: Small locule of gas noted within phlegmon
findings.bowel_thickening: Extensive bowel wall thickening of cecum and terminal ileum
findings.lymph_nodes: Numerous mesenteric lymph nodes noted, likely reactive
findings.gallbladder: Incompletely distended, no wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid
findings.kidneys: Enhance and excrete contrast symmetrically without evidence of hydronephrosis
